entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-20
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [Swift language features] Add special handling of `Swift.Array` and `Swift.Set` bound generics #2982
  • [Projection tooling] Investigate demangler errors for async functions #3007

Updated

  • [Swift shipping] Create `Swift.Bindings` and tooling NuGet packages in the dotnet-experimental feed #2849
  • [Swift shipping] Implement device testing framework #2850
  • [Swift language feature] Support async generics methods & special-case Array/Set bound generics methods #3001

PullRequests

Merged

  • [Swift Bindings] Initialize bound generics handling #3003
    area-SwiftBindings
  • [Swift shipping] Setup MacCatalyst tests on the CI #2998
    area-SwiftBindings

Updated

  • [Swift ABI compatibility] Functional tests for `InitWithCopy` and `Destroy` functions in value witness table #3009
    area-SwiftBindings
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Add WasmExternalDwarf property to create an external_debug_info section #2786
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM
  • [Swift ABI compatibility] Document memory ownership and handling at the Swift–C# boundary #3008
    area-SwiftBindings
